item.title: Server Panel
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

well, i’m using a source based on allstarscape and the WritePlayers(); is already there but the same problem occurs. all i can see when it flashes is my username and some 999 thingy. Well, thats all i noticed.

It always dissapears instantly.

any help for me and maybe lolvengeance on that?

item.title: Server Panel
item.dc:creator: @packet1 packet[]
item.description:
@packet1 wrote:

this might resolve your problem:
[hr]

in client.java press control + f

search for

public boolean process()

underneath that add

WritePlayers();

Save and compile

Read full topic

item.title: Server Panel
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

hey guys
i’m trying to make a server panel at the moment and ive added this code :
if(serverpanel)
{
serverpanel = false;
sendMessage(“You have turned the server panel off. Type ::serverpanel to get it back.”);
}
else if(!serverpanel)
{
serverpanel = true;
sendMessage(“You have turned the server panel back on. Type ::serverpanel if you wish to turn it off.”);
}
}
public void WritePlayers()
{

	if(serverpanel)
	{
		setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
	}
	else if(!serverpanel)
	{
		setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
	}


	int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();

	if(nonWild())
	{
		sendQuest("Safe", 15900);
	}
	else if(!nonWild())
	{
		sendQuest("Un-safe", 15900);
	}

	sendQuest("ServerPanel:", 15894); //Title

	//Left hand side
	sendQuest("Owner: The Hidd3n", 15895);
	sendQuest("Co-Owner:", 15897);
	sendQuest("Players Online: @gre@"+players, 15898);
	sendQuest("Made by: The Hidd3n", 15899);
	//sendQuest("Wild status:", 15900); // Used for Safe zones!
	sendQuest("", 15901);

	//Right hand side
	sendQuest("", 15896);
	sendQuest("", 15902);
	sendQuest("", 15903);
	sendQuest("", 15904);
	sendQuest("", 15905);
	sendQuest("", 15906);
}

i dont get any errors when i compile but , the server panel only comes up wen i tele somewhere and it only flashes up and then disappears, does anyone know how to make it stay up permanently?
thanks

Read full topic
